query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZPSTW1903F ( MANDT , POSID , CHKDAT , ZZGUBUN , CH_PER , ZQNUM , FNUM , FPATH , FNAME , FNAME_APP , CRDAT , CRTIM , CRNAM , BIGO ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , #POSID# , #CHKDAT# , #ZZGUBUN# , #CH_PER# , #ZQNUM# , #FNUM# , #FPATH# , #FNAME# , #FNAME_APP# , HEX(CURRENT DATE) , HEX(CURRENT TIME) , #G_USER_ID# , #BIGO# )
